text: atarkavan ‘‘inta vella(p piralaya)ttiliruntu ennaik kapparrakkutiya oru malaiyin mel nan cenru vituven'' enru kurinan. Atarkavar ‘‘allah arul purintalanri avanutaiya kattalaiyiliruntu patukattuk kolla inru oruvaralum mutiyatu'' enru kurinar. (Accamayam) avarkalukku itaiyil or alai elumpi kurukkittatu; avanum mulkiyavarkalutan mulkivittan
